Letter from Queen Navari:
Members of our people was attacked by a total stranger at Forsaken Plains.
Fortunately, no one gets hurt, but one of our asset has been lost
Now you must go find High Priest Orven of Einhasad's Temple at Town of Aden. He will tell you the details.
(I left a Scroll of Escapealong with the letter in this envelope. If you want to have a quick travel, then just use it.)
